participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, with a passion for crafting and family.
participant_1.background: i am retired and living the great life. i have amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and lively, always looking for fun adventures.
participant_2.background: i'm a party animal. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i am deathly afraid of heights. my favorite movie is mean girls. i own a cat and a dog.
